sentence.Network_en: Never before has a summit had such a crowded agenda.
sentence.Network_cn: 以前从来没有一次峰会的日程排得这么满。

sentence.Network_en: On arrival, a six-course meal was top of the agenda.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们到达之后要做的第一件事是吃一顿六道菜的大餐。

sentence.Network_en: Officials tussled over who had responsibility for the newly fashionable unemployment agenda.
sentence.Network_cn: 众官员为谁负责最近备受关注的失业议题一事争得不可开交。

jx.jx_en_mean: scheduled for discussion at a meeting

lj.lj_ly: the rights of minorities would be high on the agenda at the conference.
lj.lj_ls: 少数民族权利问题会是大会的重要议程。

jx.jx_en_mean: draw up a list of items to be discussed at a meeting

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the sense 'things to be done'): from Latin, neuter plural of agendum, gerund of agere 'do'

entry.def: You can refer to the political issues which are important at a particular time as an agenda.

example.ex: Does television set the agenda on foreign policy?...
example.tran: 电视舆论对外交政策有影响吗？

example.ex: Many of the coalition members could have their own political agendas...
example.tran: 许多联盟成员可能会有他们自己的政治议题。

entry.def: An agenda is a list of the items that have to be discussed at a meeting.

example.ex: This is sure to be an item on the agenda next week...
example.tran: 这一定会成为下星期议事日程上的一项议题。

example.ex: High on the agenda of tomorrow's meeting will be the turmoil in Japan.
example.tran: 日本发生的骚乱将是明天会议的首要议题。

means.word_mean: 1. a temporally organized plan for matters to be attended to
2. a list of matters to be taken up (as at a meeting)

auth_sentence.content: Everybody has an agenda, so get over it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Everybody has an agenda, so get over it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Everybody has an agenda, so get over it.

auth_sentence.content: The GOP agenda isn't specific on those programs.
auth_sentence.res_content: The GOP agenda isn't specific on those programs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The GOP agenda isn't specific on those programs.

auth_sentence.content: But their agenda contains the seeds of greater folly.
auth_sentence.res_content: But their agenda contains the seeds of greater folly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But their agenda contains the seeds of greater folly.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ag做,代理做+ile……的→能做的→灵活的
ag做,代理做+ency状态;机构→代理机构
ag做,代理做+enda表示复数→做的事情→议程
ag做,代理做+ent……人→做的人→代理人;作用因素
agile[adj.灵活的,敏捷的]+ity性质,特性→n.敏捷, 活泼
agitate[v.鼓动;搅动]+ion动作或状态→n.鼓动,煽动
co共同+agent[n.作用因素;代理人]→共同做的人
counter反+agent作用因素→反作用→反抗力
re再+agent作用→再次作用→反应,引申为化学试剂
ag做,代理做+it+ate表动作→反复作→鼓动

Sentence.sentence: First on her agenda was to pursue her dream of hosting a pop music programme.
How Obama's agenda is going to affect the life of Americans.

means.word_mean: 议事日程，（会议的）议程表

sentences.en: The agendas for the next two meetings have yet to be worked out.
sentences.cn: 下两次会议的议程尚需制定。

sentences.en: The first item on the agenda was how to cut down the cost in manufacture.
sentences.cn: 第一项议程是如何减少生产费用。

jushi.english: The two sides agreed on the agenda.
jushi.chinese: 双方就议事日程取得一致意见。

jushi.english: The chairman says we have a lengthy agenda this afternoon.
jushi.chinese: 会议主席说今天下午有一长串待议事项。
